title: Abyssal lantern

properties.value: The abyssal lantern is an item worn in the shield slot that can be obtained from the Rewards Guardian after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift.

The abyssal lantern is an item worn in the shield slot that can be obtained from the Rewards Guardian after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift.

Players with the appropriate Firemaking level and a tinderbox can use six logs of a certain type on the lantern to light it, which gives varying benefits when worn during Guardians of the Rift, this cannot be boosted. Coloured logs can be used in place of normal logs, though they give the same effects. No Firemaking experience is gained for lighting abyssal lanterns.

In addition to the benefits provided within Guardians of the Rift, the lit lantern serves as an equipable light source.

Any extra abyssal lanterns the player has can be exchanged with Apprentice Felix for 100 abyssal pearls.

Benefits[edit | edit source]

Inspecting a lit abyssal lantern will inform players of the benefits provided. To switch effects, players can right-click "Extinguish" and use another six logs of a desired type on it. Players can only have one abyssal lantern lit at a time; attempting to light a second one results in a message in the chatbox stating "You cannot light the abyssal lantern as you already have one lit."

Level Logs Effect In-game description
1 Normal The chance of finding portal talismans is increased by 10%. When helping the Guardians of the Rift, the fire produced from this lantern increases your chance of finding portal talismans by 10%.
15 Oak Provides a 5% chance to double your contribution points for an action.

Increases point contribution cap by 5%.

When helping the Guardians of the Rift, the fire produced from this lantern increases your elemental and catalytic energy gained by 5%.
30 Willow The amount of runes crafted are increased by 5%. When helping the Guardians of the Rift, the fire produced from this lantern increases the amount of runes you craft by 5%.
45 Maple The chance of finding portal talismans is increased by 20%. When helping the Guardians of the Rift, the fire produced from this lantern increases your chance of finding portal talismans by 20%.
60 Yew Provides a 10% chance to double your contribution points for an action.

Increases point contribution cap by 10%.

When helping the Guardians of the Rift, the fire produced from this lantern increases your elemental and catalytic energy gained by 10%.
62 Blisterwood The amount of blood runes crafted are increased by 20%. When helping the Guardians of the Rift, the fire produced from this lantern increases the amount of blood runes you craft by 20%.
75 Magic The amount of runes crafted are increased by 10%. When helping the Guardians of the Rift, the fire produced from this lantern increases the amount of runes you craft by 10%.
90 Redwood Essence pouches will not degrade, and the effects of oak and willow lanterns are applied as well. When helping the Guardians of the Rift, the fire produced from this lantern increases your elemental and catalytic energy gained by 5%, increases your runes crafted by 5% and your pouches will no longer degrade.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 April 2022
(update)
  • Players can now trade in abyssal lanterns for 100 abyssal pearls by talking to Apprentice Felix.
  • The abyssal lantern will no longer cause the Robe bottoms of the eye to stretch on male players.
30 March 2022
(update)
  • Abyssal lanterns will no longer be destroyed upon dying outside level 20+ Wilderness.
  • The destroy text for lit abyssal lanterns have been changed. Previously, the destroy text was "You will have to purchase another one from Apprentice Cordelia."

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • During development, lighting the abyssal lantern required two logs of a certain type, but would only stay lit for one round; up to ten logs could be used to light it, which would allow it to stay lit for five rounds. This was changed before release to its current functionality.
  • On release, the destroy text for lit abyssal lanterns originally stated that players can purchase another lantern from Apprentice Cordelia. However, she cannot be talked to, nor are lanterns purchasable; this is due to the lantern originally being polled as a purchasable reward, which was then changed for thematic reasons midway through development.

The '''abyssal lantern''' is an item worn in the [[shield slot]] that can be obtained from the [[Rewards Guardian]] after completing a round of [[Guardians of the Rift]].

Players with the appropriate [[Firemaking]] level and a [[tinderbox]] can use six logs of a certain type on the lantern to light it, which gives varying benefits when worn during [[Guardians of the Rift]], this '''cannot''' be boosted. [[Coloured logs]] can be used in place of normal [[logs]], though they give the same effects. No Firemaking experience is gained for lighting abyssal lanterns.

In addition to the benefits provided within Guardians of the Rift, the lit lantern serves as an equipable [[light source]].

Any extra abyssal lanterns the player has can be exchanged with [[Apprentice Felix]] for 100 [[abyssal pearls]].

==Benefits==
Inspecting a lit abyssal lantern will inform players of the benefits provided. To switch effects, players can right-click "Extinguish" and use another six logs of a desired type on it. Players can only have one abyssal lantern lit at a time; attempting to light a second one results in a message in the chatbox stating "''You cannot light the abyssal lantern as you already have one lit.''"

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 13 April 2022
|update = Easter 2022
|change = 
* Players can now trade in abyssal lanterns for 100 abyssal pearls by talking to [[Apprentice Felix]].
* The abyssal lantern will no longer cause the [[Robe bottoms of the eye]] to stretch on male players.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 30 March 2022
|update = Guardians of the Rift Improvements
|change = * Abyssal lanterns will no longer be destroyed upon [[dying]] outside level 20+ [[Wilderness]].
* The destroy text for lit abyssal lanterns have been changed. Previously, the destroy text was "You will have to purchase another one from Apprentice Cordelia."
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
* During development, lighting the abyssal lantern required two logs of a certain type, but would only stay lit for one round; up to ten logs could be used to light it, which would allow it to stay lit for five rounds. This was changed before release to its current functionality.
* On release, the destroy text for lit abyssal lanterns originally stated that players can purchase another lantern from [[Apprentice Cordelia]]. However, she cannot be talked to, nor are lanterns purchasable; this is due to the lantern originally being polled as a purchasable reward, which was then changed for thematic reasons midway through development.

{{Guardians of the Rift}}
